name: Media
description:
## Uploading Media

The Levo Media Service provides a convenient and efficient way to upload and store media files, such as images, videos, and documents, securely in the cloud. This service accepts multipart form-data uploads of files and converts images to WEBP format to comply with web standards.

The upload request should be a `POST` request with `multipart/form-data` content type. Include the media file as part of the form-data with the key `media`.

Upon successful upload, the media service responds with a JSON object containing metadata about the uploaded file in the following format:

```json
{
    "id": "JyOazEtP2HqPl",
    "location": "https://space.levo.so/WD4RLK2Q/mqdefault-ximoeCAMljB1c.jpg",
    "mimetype": "image/jpeg",
    "kind": "image",
    "srcset": {
        "1080w": "https://space.levo.so/WD4RLK2Q/mqdefault-ximoeCAMljB1c-1080w.webp",
        ...
    }
}
```

- `id`: Unique identifier for the uploaded file.
- `location`: URL where the file is stored.
- `mimetype`: MIME type of the uploaded file.
- `kind`: Type of the file (e.g., `image`, `video`, `document`).
- `srcset`: Set of URLs for different resolutions of the file, converted to WEBP format.
